Revit is a building information modelling (BIM) software that helps constructions companies, structural engineers, architects and mechanical, engineering and plumbing (MEP) service providers manage designing, 3D visualization, analysis and other construction operations.
Revit includes communication management tools, which lets teams share files, simultaneously work on projects and add notes or annotations on designs in a shared workspace to facilitate collaboration across multiple departments. Features include process design and documentation, 2D sheets import/export, construction coordination, fabrication management and more. Additionally, engineers can generate a variety of model-based designs such as elevations, floor plans and 3D views.
Revit supports integration with Autodesk Insight 360 application, which allows managers to gain insight into operations and utilization of resources to handle energy and environmental performance throughout the construction lifecycle. Pricing includes monthly/annual subscriptions and support is extended via phone, documentation and other online measures.

Quickbase is a no-code collaborative work management platform that empowers citizen developers to improve operations through real-time insights and automations across complex processes and disparate systems. Here's why Quickbase is trusted by more than 80% of Fortune 50 companies:
1. The Quickbase product and expertise helps organizations establish operational agility across their enterprise and value chain (customers, partners, and suppliers).
2. Quickbase enables business people who may not be software developers to create and continually improve unique digital solutions that cut across business systems and teams.
3. The platform’s IT trusted governance and control capabilities allow for the platform to be distributed across enterprises for business critical solutions.

AutoCAD Architecture is architectural design software. It helps users design and draft industry-specific designs. AutoCAD Architecture's features include architectural renovations; wall, door and window design documentation, and room documentation. In addition, AutoCAD features are available in architecture packages such as DWG compare, save-to-web and mobile, 2D graphic, shared views, an AutoCAD web app, an AutoCAD mobile app, and PDF import.

What is AutoCAD Architecture?

 AutoCAD Architecture is an on-premise solution for architectural design that provides specialized tools to create floor plans, sections, elevations, and other drawings. 
How do you use AutoCAD Architecture?

 AutoCAD Architecture can be downloaded from the AutoDesk website and installed on Windows and Mac devices. Within the application, users can access templates to start new drawings, open existing files or projects, customize tool palettes, and more. 
Who uses AutoCAD Architecture?

 AutoCAD Architecture is primarily used by architects, engineers, and construction professionals. 
How much does AutoCAD Architecture cost?

 AutoCAD Architecture is included with an AutoCAD subscription. Pricing for AutoCAD is $220 paid monthly, $1,775 paid yearly, or $4,795 paid every 3 years. 
Does AutoCAD Architecture have an app?

 Yes, the AutoCAD mobile app (for iOS, Android, and Windows phones) can be used to view, create, and edit DWG files.

Archicad by Graphisoft is a building information modeling (BIM) solution designed for architects, designers, interior designers and urban planners. The product caters to small and midsize businesses and is available both in cloud-based and on-premise deployment options.
Archicad features conceptual design, which enables users to calculate floor area in a construction plan. The product also features a visualization module, which allows users to extract still images and animations for a building plan. Archicad’s automatic drawing generation provides users the tools to extract standard documents such as building views, sections, elevations and 3D documents.
Archicad features Solibri Model Checker, which analyzes the building information model to identify potential design weaknesses and clashing components. It also ensures that the designs follow recommended BIM standards. Users can also estimate the energy requirements and costs for a model.
Archicad offers integration with different construction systems, such as Revit, AutoCAD, Navisworks, Tekla BIMsight and Allplan Engineering systems.

What is Archicad?

 Archicad is a building information management system with tools for designing, visualizing, and delivering building plans. 
How do I use Archicad?

 Users login to Archicad to collaborate with their team on architectural plans. They can utilize tools for design and modeling that can be automatically documented to save time. 
Who uses Archicad?

 Architects and building designers 
How much does Archicad cost?

 Archicad is priced at $200 plus tax per month with annual billing. However, there's an option to get the Collaborate Bundle, which bundles Archicad with BIMcloud and BIMx Pro, for a more attractive rate of $225 plus tax per month, also billed annually.
Does Archicad have an app?

 They provide an app, BIMx, in order to view designs.

D5 Render is a real-time ray tracing renderer for architecture, landscape, interior design, engineering and other 3D professionals. The software is fully compatible with SketchUp, 3ds Max, Revit, Archicad, Rhino, C4D and Blender with free live-sync plugins.
Combining the advantages of ray tracing and rasterization, D5 renders images, videos and panoramas fast enough to spare time for fine-tuning or further edits. As a real-time rendering solution, D5 allows users to see every change they make applied to the scene in real time with preview functionality and relatively high FPS. With an UI, features and abundant assets, D5 Render has thus become an ideal tool for designers, architects and 3D artists.

ActCAD is an engineering solution for drafting 2D layouts, buildings, sections, and other engineering drawings on a unified portal. The platform enables organizations to edit 3D models, design and export custom tables to CSV and simultaneously work on multiple designs.
ActCAD uses the IntelliCAD engine, open design alliance DWG/DXF libraries, ACIS 3D modeling kernel and many other technologies. It offers a host of features such as data export/import, 3D rendering model, script recording and playbook, graphical block preview, custom menus and more. Additionally, teams can handle 2D CAD drafting for interior designs, mechanical engineering, site development, civil engineering, and architectural engineering projects.
ActCAD lets enterprises convert various 2D and 3D files into IGES, STP, DXF, DWG and other formats. Pricing details are available on request and support is extended via phone, email and other online measures.

MicroStation is an architectural CAD solution designed to help businesses in the construction, petroleum, mining and other sectors create, modify and visualize 2D and 3D designs. Administrators can create annotations, paper plots, 3D physical models and PDFs on a unified interface.
The platform lets designers add 3D reality meshes, geospatial information and point clouds to create construction models. MicroStation allows creators to use built-in templates and include dimensions, symbols, lines and texts in drawings based on project-specific standards. Additionally, teams can analyze various properties of the object including slope and aspect angle to visualize designs in a centralized dashboard.
MicroStation enables operators to select time-based animations, produce realistic movies and preview lifelike visualizations in real-time. Pricing is based on monthly subscriptions and support is extended via FAQs and online portal.

Lumion is an on-premise solution designed to help architects transform their CAD designs into renders. The platform enables designers to convert 3D CAD designs into beautiful videos, images and 360 panoramas with custom effects and elements.
Lumion comes with a built-in content library with a variety of objects including lights, building models, vehicles, furniture, animated children, animals and birds, trees, roads, and more. Teams can add, modify and render landscapes, clouds, water, sky, buildings, material, and other elements using the scene editor. Additionally, it supports various file types such as BMP, JPG, OBJ, FBX, MP4, and more for images, videos, and material maps.
Lumion lets users import models via integration with various modeling applications such as AutoCAD, Revit, ArchiCAD, SketchUp, and more. Pricing includes one-time payment and support is extended via email, FAQs and other online measures.

KeyCreator is 3D CAD software that supports design with solids, 2D, wireframe, surfacing and building of assemblies all in the same 3D workspace. Developed closely with manufacturers and engineers, KeyCreator combines the flexibility of direct modeling with a broad range of translators, making it ideal for projects where quick, unplanned design variations and productive reuse of design data from anywhere are critical.
KeyCreator is powered by core technologies that can recognize, or even infer, the geometry’s attributes to facilitate interoperability in what might otherwise be unusable data. This strategy allows geometry, no matter where it originated, to be used throughout the manufacturing supply chain to speed time to market, reduce costs and improve quality.

AttendanceBot is a time and attendance tracking solution that helps businesses manage time-off requests, overtime and availability of employees. It enables managers to streamline employee scheduling operations, approve employees’ leave requests and generate custom reports via a unified platform.
AttendanceBot lets administrators define leave policies in compliance with industry regulations, create custom leave types and handle payroll management processes. It offers a host of features such as automated notifications, activity tracking, mobile access, a self-service portal, project management, analytics and timesheet management.
AttendanceBot facilitates integration with various third-party applications such as Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Slack, Gusto, Apple Calendar and more. Pricing is available on a monthly or annual subscription and support is extended via phone, email, FAQs and other online measures.

3ds Max is a cloud-based animation software that provides businesses with tools to create, model and render 3D design visualizations. Professionals can create procedural open shading language (OSL) maps and utilize spline tools to animate geometrical designs.
3ds Max allows organizations to rebuild adjacent faces of 3D objects, automatically optimize the geometry of high-resolution models and apply various textures, colors or material finishes across designs. Editors can build animated characters, edit animation trajectories and include particle matters in models. Additionally, users can create and add realistic liquid behaviors or effects, including water, oil, lava and more.
3ds Max enables businesses to import data and simulate realistic camera settings or artificial light sources across models. Pricing is available on monthly or annual subscriptions and support is extended via FAQs, phone, email and other online measures.

CubiCasa creates accurate free floor plans for real estate marketing. Our floor plans are customizable and white labeled for real estate listings available at no charge in the United States.
We believe floor plans should be ubiquitous for a better-functioning real estate market. They are widely used in many countries around the world because of their benefits. To date, we’re proud to service some of the largest appraisal management companies (AMCs) and real estate businesses globally.
CubiCasa’s technology is designed to produce accurate floor plans with minimal inconsistencies and variations. There is no need for lengthy onboarding process or training to use CubiCasa. This easy-to-use mobile app requires only a smartphone.
All you need to do is complete a property walkthrough with your smartphone, and our technology will take care of the rest. Property features are generated based on elements in the floor plan during the scan and publicly available data.
The platform also makes customizable listing floor plans with fixed furniture with a standard 24h-hour turnaround time. Fixtures will illustrate the fixed installations such as bathroom fixtures, kitchen cabinetry, and appliances.
Free floor plan scans in the United States also include the option to upgrade with fixed furniture and feature add-ons, American National Standards Institute (ANSI)-aligned GLA outputs, and an expedited six-hour delivery.

RoomSketcher is a cloud-based home design & floor plan drafting tool for Mac, Windows, and iPad users. Available in English, Danish, German, Norwegian, and Swedish, this tool is geared toward real estate, interior design, property development, and management professionals. It’s used by tech-savvy homeowners and makers or sellers of furniture, fixtures, and fittings.
RoomSketcher lets users draw floor plans themselves, or they can rely on the developer’s white-glove service instead. The tool can produce crisp 2D floor plans in black and white, featuring built-in measurements and the option to upload blueprints to use as templates.
Users can also opt for 3D floor plans with branding, disclaimers, and texture variations for home design and remodeling projects. To showcase real estate projects, show homes, and furniture layouts, they can also add 3D photos, simulations, and virtual walkthroughs. It helps investors, planning officers, and homebuyers visualize the space.

Chief Architect is an interior design and remodeling software that helps residential builders, architects, and remodelers design and manage architectural designs. The platform allows users to automatically generate floor plans, 3D models and 2D drawings and share them with contractors.
Chief Architect lets designed generate sketches for basic floor plans, and add features such as walls, doors, and windows and elements like moldings, furniture, and appliances. Designers can also create 360-degree panoramic renderings and elevations.
It is available on one-time payment and support is extended via phone, email and other online measures.

Enscape is a real-time rendering and virtual reality plugin for Revit, SketchUp, Rhino, Archicad, and Vectorworks. It plugs directly into your modeling software, giving you an integrated visualization and design workflow.
As an intuitive design tool, it requires no prior specialized knowledge to use. You can design, document, and visualize simultaneously from one model. It is the easiest and fastest way to turn your building models into immersive 3D experiences.
Bring your designs to life and give your clients a design experience like never before. Used by 85 of the top 100 architecture firms worldwide, Enscape empowers your design workflow.

NotifyVisitors is an AI-powered marketing automation suite that provides omnichannel customer engagement, segmentation, CRO marketing, and digital analytics solutions. With an integrated journey builder, marketing departments can create and visualize campaigns and automate every step of the customer journey. Users can utilize simple but powerful targeting rules to display notifications based on visitor behavior and preferences.

Vectorworks is a versatile, on-premise application that provides extensive 2D drafting, 3D modeling, BIM and rendering capabilities for your architectural and landscape design needs. Vectorworks is equipped with designer-focused tools and features, allowing your workflows to have great freedom, ease of use and flexibility.
A key strength of Vectorworks is its ability to serve your entire creative process, from the initial concept stage through design development, construction drawings, and presentations. 2D drawings and graphics are of rich quality and renderings can range from sketch-styles to photorealistic – All within this one application. Using Vectorworks means it is very likely you will not need to purchase, learn or maintain any other software for your design needs.
With deep BIM integration, Vectorworks enables many techniques and pathways for incorporating construction data into your design and reporting that data on demand. This results in a high level of accuracy and productivity for your firm.
Built-in collaboration tools allow Vectorworks to be a suitable solution for both small and large teams, and for projects of all sizes. A wide range of import and export options permits Vectorworks users to collaborate with users of most other software as required.

Cedreo is a 3D home design software for home builders, contractors, remodelers, real estate developers, and interior designers. With more than 7,000 customizable furnishings and materials, it allows users to create a complete conceptual design presentation in just 2 hours including 2D and 3D floor plans and interior and exterior photorealistic 3D renderings.
Equipped with many time-saving features and a comprehensive online knowledge base, Cedreo is fast, intuitive and easy-to-use. With Cedreo, businesses can streamline the sales process, reduce the cost of the pre-sale phase and improve the client's buying experience. Users can start their designs from scratch or re-use and customize previous projects.
Homebuilders can create stunning photorealistic 3D renderings to help clients envision the project before it is built, facilitate communication, and sell faster.

AGi32 is a comprehensive photometric calculation tool that helps lighting designers, architects, and electrical engineers assess, predict and quantify the distribution of natural or artificial light across any architectural environment. Users can assess the luminaire placement of lighting and generate reports to ensure regulatory compliance with industry regulations.
With AGi32, businesses can visualize the changes in luminance of different materials in 3D. The software provides a built-in manufacturing database to search for suitable products, improving users' experience with the brand.

NodalView is a cloud-based virtual tour software that helps real estate businesses create interactive property listings by capturing panorama videos, visuals, and teasers. It offers an immersive customer experience with guided virtual tours and interactive 3D models, enabling agents to showcase the best features of their properties. Staff members can build ads, publish content, and measure prospects' interests from a unified platform.
Nodalview enables users to edit images, personalize content as well as share videos on social media or advertising platforms. Pricing is based on monthly or yearly subscriptions, and support is extended via phone and other measures.

Concept3D is a cloud-based mapping platform designed to help businesses in healthcare, education, hospitality and other sectors design 3D maps and virtual tour experiences for clients. With the built-in content management system (CMS), administrators can store and organize digital media files including images and videos on a centralized platform.
Key features of Concept3D include collaboration, resource tracking, space planning, virtual engagement, 3D rendering, data visualization and more. Stakeholders can utilize the Mapbox engine to create and edit customizable maps by modifying the map orientation and tile colors. Additionally, clients can view important details including room numbers, emergency exits and accessibility routes using the wayfinding functionality.
Concept3D comes with an application programming interface (API), which facilitates integration with several third-party platforms, such as Localist, ArcGIS, Modo Labs and DoubleMap. Pricing is available on request and support is extended via phone, email, FAQs and online measures.

Tekla Structures (formerly Tekla BIMsight) is a Windows-based construction collaboration solution. It enables users to combine 3D models, add projects and allows project participants to identify or resolve conflicts in the design phase. Construction managers can also avoid conflicts by using an automated clash-detection tool. Tekla Structures enables users to look deeper into 3D models by using a clip planes feature. Users can also take notes for issues and sort them by type. Support is offered via online forums and email.

What is Tekla Structures?

 Tekla Structures, formerly Tekla BIMsight, is a structural BIM software used to create and manage 3D models for construction projects. 
How do you use Tekla Structures?

 Users can purchase online or on-premise licenses and manage product configurations using Tekla’s Online Admin Tool. Depending on the license type, Tekla Structures provides viewing and collaboration features, modeling and design documentation, and/or detailing and production information. 
Who uses Tekla Structures?

 Tekla Structures is used by architects, steel detailers and fabricators, bridge engineers, concrete contractors, and other construction professionals. It is also suitable for educational institutions. 
How much does Tekla Structures cost?

 Pricing details for Tekla Structures are not shared publicly. Please contact Trimble for information on starting price and available plans or tiers. 
Does Tekla Structures have an app?

 Yes, the Tekla BIMsight Note app (for iOS and Android) can be used to create and reply to BIM workflow notes.

SimSolid is a software that provides simulation technology for engineers, designers, and analysts. It eliminates meshing and geometry preparation.
Design scenarios can be simulated under real-life conditions. Early CAD models can be used in any common format. SimSolid offers a tolerance of imprecise geometry which means that unlike CAD-embedded simulation tools, there won't be a need to simplify complex geometries before analyzing designs.
SimSolid supports all connections (bolt/nut, bonded, welds, rivets, sliding) and analysis of linear static, thermal, modal properties along with other more complex coupled, transient and nonlinear dynamic effects. The software provides simulation power to help quicken engineering decisions, SimSolid also aids with the faster development of quality products to beat competitors to market.

Sloyd is a cloud-based solution that helps businesses generate objects from a text prompt and also edit it with conversational AI or a set of inputs such as sliders and buttons.
Artists can also use Sloyd as their starting point, and then add their unique style to the assets in any 3D software.

Space Designer is an online architectural space-planning application that lets users visualize their projects in 3D. Its intuitive tools are user-friendly for professionals and novices alike.
Its technology is adopted by a large range of individuals and professionals, such as event designers, realtors, furniture retailers, communication agencies or interior designers.
Space Designer 3D lets anyone draw an architectural project in a few seconds.
The application is built as a modular platform – companies can add extensions, new tools and custom interfaces.
Every project automatically generates a customizable inventory list that includes multiple metrics, such as object dimensions, products, and quantities. The produced data can be personalized to business needs.
The product catalog is fully customizable.
More than a designing and visualization application, it is a communication channel between individuals and professionals.
Space Designer 3D is an ecosystem containing several applications in one. One of its goals is to attract clients on your website and entice them to stay longer, to interact with your product thanks to the 3D application. To achieve this interaction, we integrate the application on your website under a white label, allowing prospects to see in 2D and 3D. Prospects have to sign up to access their project, in which your product is displayed.
This interactive journey can be adapted depending on your business model in a lot of different ways. In any case, this system involves your prospects directly. They become active in the process, not passive. You offer them another way to shop from their home, an option where they can “manipulate” the product in 3D.
Your product can be a house plan, furniture items, a service like interior design… it can be both tangible and intangible.
The aim is for your prospect to go through a journey on your website, play with the application and end this journey with a purchase of your product. But even if the journey doesn’t end with a purchase, you have their contact information, which will allow you to get in touch with them and encourage them to either buy your product, or get in touch with you to help buy it.
This lead generation list can be customized : you can encourage prospects to leave certain key information that matters for your business model, such as their region, or their country, etc.

FLOORFY is a software for real estate agents. With this software, users create virtual tours with integrated video call systems and share them with their customers. Users can also use it to create dimensioned floor plans, a 3D rendering and a commercial video, HD photographs and much more.
A virtual tour is a digital tool that serves to simulate a real space by means of 360-degree photographs linked and chained through a software that will allow the user to appreciate the aesthetics, colours and finishes of a property in a much more comfortable and realistic way.

nTopology is a computer-aided design (CAD) software that provides small to large manufacturing firms with innovative engineering tools. nTopology's implicit modeling engine uses a single equation to define the solid shape of any object. This improves design agility, shortening the time it takes to go from concept to end product.
The platform gives users control over their entire generative workflow and optimization process. Designers can create reusable workflows for their applications that are tailored to those applications' unique requirements. Use simulation results, test data, and engineering formulas to design control systems anywhere in space.

Aptean EAM, a CMMS / EAM solution, helps customers in industrial manufacturing, food and beverage, and process manufacturing maintain critical assets that are crucial to production uptime by avoiding costly and catastrophic equipment failures. Aptean EAM was designed by maintenance professionals with extensive maintenance and inventory experience in asset intensive industries where asset reliability is essential. It uniquely combines deep functionality with configurability, ease-of-use and advanced technology.

Render Plus is a 3D architecture and CAD suite designed for professionals using AutoCAD, Revit and SketchUp applications. It offers various solutions such as IRender nXt, RpTreeMaker, ArielVision and SpaceDesign, which enables users to create 3D drawings, adjust lighting and reflection, prepare client presentations and generate custom reports.
Features of Render Plus include data import/export, productivity tracking, image editing, presentation tools, 3D imaging, data visualization and more. It allows employees to generate animations, manage workflows and access a component library in real-time.
Organizations can utilize IRender nXt plugin to generate high-resolution architectural designs, adjust lighting and components and edit interior, exterior, daytime, or night-time scenes. Pricing is available on request and support is extended via phone, email and other online measures.

HoloBuilder is an enterprise-ready Construction Progress Management platform that enables construction teams to easily capture, communicate, and control project progress with 360° photos. With a super-fast and efficient site capturing workflow, tens of thousands of construction projects leverage HoloBuilder to create a digital replica of their job sites using 360° images and access the site remotely from anywhere. Users can navigate their way through the entire construction project to view, annotate and collaborate.
HoloBuilder is trusted by over 28,000 construction projects with customers in 35 countries, enabling general contractors, owners, and engineering firms to improve hundreds of processes, allowing them to stay on schedule and within budget.

Quick3DPlan is a powerful 3D interior design software that has become a go-to tool for professional kitchen and bathroom designers, architects, and decorators around the world. One of the main advantages of Quick3DPlan is the user-friendly interface that makes it easy to create accurate and professional-quality designs. The program features an extensive library of objects and materials that allow users to create unique and customized designs with ease.
One area where Quick3DPlan truly excels is in the design of residential kitchens, both classic and open concept. With its advanced features and tools, users can design a kitchen that is both aesthetically pleasing and functional. Quick3DPlan provides all the necessary tools for creating a complete kitchen design, including cabinets, custom countertops, appliances, and lighting fixtures. Users can easily arrange these components to create the perfect layout and adjust the sizes, colors, and finishes to suit their client's needs.
Another great feature of Quick3DPlan is its ability to generate photorealistic renders. With just a few clicks, users can create 3D models of their designs and visualize them in high-quality renders. The program features a wide range of lighting options that allow users to simulate different lighting conditions and create stunning images that showcase their designs in the best possible way.
In addition to its design and rendering capabilities, Quick3DPlan also provides users with the ability to export a detailed list of components used in their designs. This feature is particularly useful for architects and contractors, as it makes it easy to order materials and manage the project budget.
Overall, Quick3DPlan is an excellent 3D interior design software that offers a wide range of features and tools for creating professional-quality designs. Its user-friendly interface, extensive library of objects and materials, and advanced design and rendering capabilities make it an ideal choice for designers and decorators looking to create stunning designs and streamline the selling process.

Edificius is an on-premise 3D building information modeling solution designed for small and midsize architecture, engineering and construction (AEC) companies. It offers parametric architectural objects, landscaping design, a textures library, photo rendering and scene simulation functionalities within a suite.
Edificius features parametric objects, which allows users to include structural elements such as beams, pillars and walls in building drawings. It also enables users to produce drawings in multiple views, such as floor plans, cross sectional views and axonometric views.
Edificius features a textures library, which includes different designs tools such as 2D CAD blocks, HD textures and 3D models. The solution also offers real-time 3D rendering, which allows users to apply different types of rendering layouts to the drawings, such as photorealistic, transparent background and render clay. It also allows users to track the status of a design in real time by viewing a 3D layout.

Inertia is a cloud-based construction management solution designed to help enterprises breakdown complex operations and streamline business processes with centralized information and transparent reporting. Inertia offers documentation for inspections and RFI, real-time project maps with progress visualization, and data tracking and analytics.
With Inertia, project managers are able to securely track all project documentation with a centralized data system that provides controlled access for security and authentication measures. Managers can view end-of-project reports on all inspected items and track all documentation history with an integrated transaction log. Inertia can streamline project approvals to clear final decisions and manage handoffs.
Inertia also offers real-time construction project maps to visualize progress and improve project collaboration. Project managers can organize project maps with color-coding functionality and track the status of every location along with every document associated with that location. Inertia can also provide complete transparent project information with real-time reporting and analytics. Project managers are able to visualize key metrics and organize key data points to predict setbacks and avoid costly re-dos.

Architect 3D Ultimate allows professionals to create 3D models of homes from scratch. With its realistic 3D views, users can see what projects will look like before they begin building them and make changes where needed. The program comes with one professional add-on that allows team members to import existing 2D objects in 3D format for a more realistic view.
Users can add roofing, add insulation and make it more energy efficient, add furniture and arrange it, design swimming pools and create realistic 3D renderings in one unified platform.

Designed for the AEC industry, Allplan is an architectural CAD and BIM solution that allows businesses to manage the entire design and construction BIM lifecycle. With seamless data integration, reliable 3D/2D modeling, and industry-leading collaboration tools, Allplan can streamline the entire design process from drafting to finished drawings, ensuring the completion of complex projects on time. Allplan robust data exchange capabilities support BIM data from various exchange formats such as PDF, DWG, IFC4, and more.

Home Design 3D is a design planning solution that helps users with architectural modeling, floor plan rendering, and interior design. Home Design 3D can be accessed on mobile, tablet, or desktop and is compatible with Android and Apple devices. The main features of Home Design 3D include import/export, 3D and 2D rendering, and customizable templates.
Users can benefit from Home Design’s customizable floor plan templates, which allows users to create their own design or choose from the pre-loaded options. The platform also helps with collaboration between colleagues who can share their designs.

Adobe Substance 3D is a design suite with features such as an asset library, HDR lighting creation, color management, and parametric modeling. With Substance 3D Designer, users can create materials and patterns, image filters, environment lights, or even 3D models. Each asset can output infinite variations. Substance 3D Designer is used across many industries and is at the center of most video game and visual effects material pipelines.

Developers, architects, and contractors that want to make the most of a site's potential and close transactions quickly can use TestFit's real estate feasibility platform to make site planning simple. By creating quick concept iterations based on your parametric input, TestFit handles the onerous processes like counting parking spaces, sketching design possibilities, and calculating the yield on cost. With real-time insights into design, constructability, and cost, our AI configurators optimize the best design solutions for every site, saving you time during site planning, lowering your risk when obtaining deals, and increasing the potentials for all of your sites.

3D Repo's mission is to rapidly modernise the AECO industry by giving all stakeholders democratic access to project data in a secure and collaborative fashion using modern enterprise architecture in the cloud.
3D Repo is a cloud-based platform for Building Information Modelling (BIM) coordination in the cloud which allows users to manage 3D model revisions and highlight potential issues using live collaboration tools.
Instead of architects, engineers, and contractors sharing massive proprietary files in a costly and time-consuming manner, they can simply point their web browser to an encrypted cloud platform in order to examine each project stage virtually.

Envisioneer by Cadsoft is a 3D building information modelling platform that assists users in designing, developing and constructing residential projects. The product is offered in four tiers based on the types of professionals and their project requirements.
The first of the four, Personal Architect, is designed for homeowners and hobbyists. It assists in budgeting, scheduling and management of construction activities. Users can also share the 3D designs as images and video files.
Pro Architect is the next level up and is designed for professionals who need to design ideas and then create construction documents. The third tier, Building Essentials is made for builders and remodelers. It includes tools that help users share ideas with clients by providing documents containing construction information.
Construction Suite is best suited for estimators, lumber and building material suppliers and educators. It covers estimate and quotes creation, integrates with point-of-sale and accounting systems and generates material lists from the models.

IDEA Architecture is a building information modelling (BIM) software that enables businesses to design 2D/3D models and streamline animation, 5D costing, and 4D scheduling operations. The application lets users export designs to create walkthrough videos of buildings.
IDEA Architecture allows designers to modify different attributes of building models like beams’ angle, width and length, walls, stairs, roofs and more. It offers a host of features such as notifications, data import/export, zoom in and out, annotations, orthophoto maps, and preview functionality.
